statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, interaction_type, user_id FROM IoT_Logs WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Logs WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM IoT_Logs WHERE device_id = 100 ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, details->'location' AS location FROM IoT_Logs WHERE details->>'location' = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Logs WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, user_id FROM IoT_Logs WHERE interaction_type = 'sensor_reading' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, interaction_type, details FROM IoT_Logs WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM IoT_Logs GROUP BY device_id, interaction_type ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, user_id, details ->> 'sensor_value' AS sensor_value FROM IoT_Logs WHERE interaction_type = 'sensor_reading' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, action, log_date FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, action FROM device_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(log_date) AS latest_log_date FROM device_logs;
SELECT trail_id, device_id, action, audit_date FROM audit_trails ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT device_id, user_id, action FROM audit_trails JOIN device_logs ON audit_trails.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM device_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, action_taken FROM device_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, device_id, timestamp FROM device_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, current_status FROM device_status WHERE current_status = 'Active';
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM audit_trail WHERE action_taken LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, action_taken FROM device_logs WHERE action_taken='deployed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(timestamp, NOW())) AS avg_days_since_timestamp FROM device_logs
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity_timestamp FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY last_activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_details WHERE status = true;
SELECT * FROM device_audit WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_details WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT audit_id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM device_audit WHERE action IN ('create', 'update') ORDER BY audit_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM device_details WHERE status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM DeviceInteractions WHERE interaction_result = 'success';
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_time, action_performed FROM UserLogs WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_type, error_description FROM Errors WHERE error_type LIKE '%connection%';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_time FROM DeviceInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, log_time FROM UserLogs WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT error_id, error_type, error_description FROM Errors WHERE error_time >= '2022-01-01' AND error_time <= '2022-12-31';
